changelog:
- Enterprise scalability: Distributed WebSocket hub for 5000+ devices
- Comprehensive inventory: Software, services, security posture collection
- Mobile device management: iOS/Android support with push notifications
- Bulk metrics insertion with PostgreSQL partitioning
- Redis Streams command queue for cross-server routing
- NGINX load balancer configuration for horizontal scaling
- Health check endpoints for load balancer integration
- Delta change detection for inventory updates
